description: A hwL2mcPortOtherQuerierTimeout notification signifies the timer of other querier of port is timeout.
This notification should be generated when the other querier timer expires, and the router
has no other querier on the same interface with the same IP version.

event.Summary: Timer of other querier of port ($v3) is timeout

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcPortOtherQuerierTimeout HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortVlanIndex i 1 HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortVsiName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortType i 1 HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortIfIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortPeId i 1 HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortCeId i 1 HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortPeerAddress a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortVcOrSiteId u 1 HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortIfName s EXAMPLE

description: The VLAN ID, which is the configuration index in a VLAN. If a VSI is specified, the value is 4095.
The value ranges from 1 to 4095.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortVlanIndex

description: The name of a VSI. If a VLAN is specified, the value is 32.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortVsiName

description: The interface type:
1: Invalid
2: PW interface
3: L2 interface
4: Encapsulation sub-interface
5: Termination sub-interface
6: Interface Board
7: Vlanif Port
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortType

description: The interface index. The value 0 indicates that the interface index is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortIfIndex

description: The PE VID of an interface.
The value ranges from 1 to 4095.
The value 4095 indicates that the PE VID is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortPeId

description: The CE VID of an interface.
The value ranges from 1 to 4095.
The value 4095 indicates that the CE VID is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortCeId

description: The peer IP address of a PW interface. The value 0.0.0.0 indicates that the IP address is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortPeerAddress

description: The VC ID or SITE ID of a PW interface.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortVcOrSiteId

description: The name of the interface.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortIfName

description: A hwL2mcReportListeningGrpExceed notification signifies The number of multicast groups has exceeded the limit on one slot.
This notification should be generated when the number of multicast groups has exceeded the limit.

event.Summary: Number of multicast groups exceeded limit $v4 on one slot

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcReportListeningGrpExceed HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsAddressType i 0 HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortIfIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortIfName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsExceedLimit u 1 HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsExceedGroupAddress s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsExceedSourceAddress s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortVsiName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortPeId i 1 HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortCeId i 1 HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortUserMac s EXAMPL

description: The address type of the multicast group and source address. If this object is set to
unknown(0) indicates that the multicast group and source address is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsAddressType

description: The interface index. The value 0 indicates that the interface index is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortIfIndex

description: The name of the interface.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortIfName

description: Limit value.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsExceedLimit

description: Excess group address. The InetAddressType is given by the
hwL2mcNotificationsAddressType object.
The value 0.0.0.0 indicates that the multicast entry is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsExceedGroupAddress

description: Excess source address.The InetAddressType is given by the
hwL2mcNotificationsAddressType object.
The value 0.0.0.0 indicates that the multicast entry is (*, G).
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsExceedSourceAddress

description: The name of a VSI. If a VLAN is specified, the value is 32.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortVsiName

description: The PE VID of an interface.
The value ranges from 1 to 4095.
The value 4095 indicates that the PE VID is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortPeId

description: The CE VID of an interface.
The value ranges from 1 to 4095.
The value 4095 indicates that the CE VID is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortCeId

description: User MAC address. The value 0000-0000-0000 indicates that the MAC address is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-L2MULTICAST-MIB::hwL2mcNotificationsPortUserMac
